audioText: Sa chance tournait définitivement quand il a découvert cette opportunité professionnelle extraordinaire.
question: When did his luck definitively turn?
options: When he discovered this extraordinary professional opportunity
When he moved to a new city
When he met his business partner
explanation: The text states 'Sa chance tournait définitivement quand il a découvert cette opportunité professionnelle extraordinaire.' - 'His luck was definitively turning when he discovered this extraordinary professional opportunity.' The noun 'chance' means luck or fortune, and 'définitivement' means definitively or permanently.
